com.radaee.pdfex

Interface PDFView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PDFViewDual, PDFViewHorz, PDFViewReflow, PDFViewScroll, PDFViewSingle, PDFViewSingleEx, PDFViewVert

    public interface PDFView
    Interface for UI control.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Radaee

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PDFView.PDFAnnotListener
      Interface for annotation operations listener.
      static class  PDFView.PDFPageDispPara
      read only class to tell developers how a page displayed.
      static class  PDFView.PDFPosition
      class record position for view.
      static class  PDFView.PDFSelDispPara
      read only class to tell developers how selection displayed.
      static interface  PDFView.PDFViewListener
      Interface for view operations listener.
      static class  PDFView.STATUS
      inner class, developer should not use this.

    • Method Detail

      • viewOpen

        void viewOpen(Context context,
            Document doc,
            int back_color,
            int page_gap)
        attach Document object.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        doc - Document object
        back_color - view background color, formated in 0xAARRGGBB, alpha channel can be 0 for transparent view.
        page_gap - gap between pages, can't be negative number.

      • viewClose

        void viewClose()
        detach Document object and destroy the object of this class.

        void viewFindStart(java.lang.String key,
                 boolean match_case,
                 boolean whole_word)
        start find-operations.

      • viewFind

        int viewFind(int dir)
        start find operation.
        Parameters:
        dir - dir < 0 means backward, dir > 0 means forward.
        Returns:
        -1 means no more found, 0 means found, 1 means pending operations.
        in pending mode: find returned when PDFViewListener.onFound fired.

      • viewFindEnd

        void viewFindEnd()
        end find-operations.

      • viewSetSel

        void viewSetSel(float x1,
              float y1,
              float x2,
              float y2)
        set text selection by 2 points
        if succeeded it will fired PDFViewListener.onSelectEnd and PDFViewListener.onSelDiaplayed

      • viewSetRatio

        boolean viewSetRatio(float ratio,
                   float fx,
                   float fy,
                   boolean wait_finish)
        set to special ratio, only can be invoked after ActionUp
        Parameters:
        ratio -
        fx - fixed point for view.
        fy - fixed point for view.
        wait_finish - wait all render finished?
        Returns:
        true or false

      • annotSetMarkup

        boolean annotSetMarkup(int type)
        set selected text as markup annotation.
        Parameters:
        type - 0: Highlight, 1: Underline, 2: StrikeOut
        Returns:
        if no text selected, return false.

      • annotSetEditText

        set edit-box value.

        Returns:
